#id: 'primary_frip_score'
#parent_id: 'peak_qc'
#parent_name: 'Peak QC'
#parent_description: 'This section contains peak-based QC reports'
#section_name: 'Sample FRiP score'
#description: "is generated by calculating the fraction of all mapped fragments that fall
#              into the peak regions called by either MACS2 or SEACR.
#              See <a href='https://www.encodeproject.org/data-standards/terms/' target='_blank'>FRiP score</a>."
#plot_type: 'bargraph'
